entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as looking calmly back into Voldemort's face and smiling. He is also referred to as 'My Lord' by Yaxley.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having a lipless mouth that curves into something like a smile. He is also referred to as 'My Lord' by Yaxley.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is described as leaning forward and speaking to Voldemort and Snape.

entities.name: dawlish
entities.description: Dawlish is referred to as the Auror who let slip that Potter will not be moved until the thirtieth.

relationships.description: Snape looks calmly back into Voldemort's face.
Yaxley speaks to Voldemort about Dawlish's information.
